items.sentence: Tom managed to convince a lot of people that he had paranormal powers.
Before making important decisions, Tom always consults his astrologer.
Tom was suspended from school for talking dirty to a female classmate.
Tom probably thought that I was going to Boston with him next weekend.
Aren't you glad that Tom gave us enough money to buy something to eat?
You see, humans don't create time; if we did we'd never run out of it.
Do you really think that Tom would've been able to do that by himself?
Tom crept up behind Mary and tickled her until she burst out laughing.
Tom looked at Mary curiously. He'd never seen someone like her before.
Tom was glad he didn't have to live in Australia for more than a year.
Tom's mother doesn't want him to marry a woman who can't speak French.
Tom said it was more difficult to do that than he thought it would be.
I had a part-time job as a hotel maid, but I didn't like it very much.
What's this song? I've heard it before, but I can't remember the name.
The snow that had piled up on the roof at night came down with a thud.
I feel restless when I have to wait too long for my friend to show up.
You are welcome to the use of our house while we are away on vacation.
We will move into our new house next month if it is completed by then.
It occurred to me that the man was trying to cheat me out of my money.
I was on the point of giving up when I suddenly hit upon the solution.
